string.minLength: must have a minimum of {minLength} characters
string.maxLength: must have a maximum of {maxLength} characters

int.greaterThanEquals: must be greater or equal to {greaterThan}
int.lessThanEquals: must be less or equal to {lessThanEquals}

double.greaterThanEquals: must be greater or equal to {greaterThan}
double.lessThanEquals: must be less or equal to {lessThanEquals}
